messages.subject: Re: Fun moments
messages.msgSnippet: ... I ... Sure, you can add this. Kay

I

Sure, you can add this.

messages.subject: Fun moments
messages.msgSnippet: We are having more and more moments like this one. I can say that unschooling has released things in me, like: wanting to play with my dd, I m really
messages.messageBody:
"We are having more and more moments like this one. I can say that
unschooling has released things in me, like: wanting to play with my
dd, I'm really interested in what she is interested in, not trying to
control every aspect of my families' lifes."

I'm collecting little tidbits about healing still.....do you mind if I
stash this one?
Nice to hear that it's bringing more playfulness into your life,
that's great.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
